column5: I have no energy or will to fight when I know there is no end. I just keep my mouth shut and lock in my emotions whatever they may be.
Yes where do I go for this
Wish it was so simple but even I don't know or care to know..... I'm just miserable and spend days on end alone. Noone has actually ever asked or cared if I'm ok or not.... I'm just so sick of life.
I'm a loser don't do anything right and I exist.

Hi thanks for the reply. ðŸ™‚

Well I'm back. Round and round we go... Tried explaining again that verbally abusing me doesn't make me feel great... But she still wants to know why I'm angry. What's the point of even talking. My entire family screwed me over my whole life and it can still hurt. But she loves to remind me of it and how i have no family. Wow thanks. That is of course on top of all the other complaints about me that never seem to stop. And finally even though she does not work.  My contribution to the family does not count.  

Yes honey you are right. I am a loser and useless..... Can someone kill me now.

Not sure what bad karma I have from my last life.... Just don't get it...
I wish I could experience what love is.
